document_data.name: House of Night's Embrace
document_data.mainbody: The '''House of Night's Embrace''' was a fortified temple and palace dedicated to [[Talona]] located in the city of [[Tashluta]] in [[1367 DR]].
document_data.Inhabitants: Lady Doom [[Thalaera Indlerith]] was the head of the House of Night's Embrace as of the {{YearlinkName|1367}}.
document_data.Activities: The House of Night's Embrace was regarded as the most prominent of all of Talona's temples in [[Faer√ªn]]. The followers of Talona made wicked poisons and [[potion]]s within its depths, designed to spread disease and sickness. Antidotes for such creations were also made and sold at high prices.
document_data.Defenses: A small army of devout followers, assisted by [[golem]]s and [[gargoyle]]s, defended the temple.
